con:config.script:
import static com.jayway.jsonpath.JsonPath.parse
def ParentAttributeId = context.expand( '${GetEventAttributeByEventName#Response#$[?(@.AttributeName==\'Quantity\')].ParentAttributeId[0]}')

import static com.jayway.jsonpath.JsonPath.parse
def eventAttributeId = context.expand( '${GetEventAttributeByEventName#Response#$[?(@.AttributeName==\'Quantity\')].EventAttributeId[0]}')

import static com.jayway.jsonpath.JsonPath.parse
def ParentAttributeId = context.expand( '${GetEventAttributeByEventName#Response#$[?(@.AttributeName==\'BonusIssuedCount\')].ParentAttributeId[0]}')

import static com.jayway.jsonpath.JsonPath.parse
def eventAttributeId = context.expand( '${GetEventAttributeByEventName#Response#$[?(@.AttributeName==\'BonusIssuedCount\')].EventAttributeId[0]}')

import static com.jayway.jsonpath.JsonPath.parse
def ParentAttributeId = context.expand( '${GetEventAttributeByEventName#Response#$[?(@.AttributeName==\'PointsLifetime\')].ParentAttributeId[0]}')

import static com.jayway.jsonpath.JsonPath.parse
def eventAttributeId = context.expand( '${GetEventAttributeByEventName#Response#$[?(@.AttributeName==\'PointsLifetime\')].EventAttributeId[0]}')

con:restRequest.name: UpdateEventAttributeByEventName
con:restRequest.con:request:
{ "EventAttributeId": "${eventAttributeIdQuantity#result}", "ParentAttributeId": "${ParentAttributeIdQuantity#result}", "AttributeName": "Quantity", "CyclicIndicator": true, "CapIndicator": false, "CyclicMapField": "LineItemQuantity", "IsLineItem": false, "CollectionIndicator": false, "DataTypeDrl": "Double", "DataTypeUi": "Number", "EventType": "PurchaseTxn", "AttributeFqn": "PurchaseTxn.TransactionDetails.Quantity", "DroolsVariableName": "$PurchaseTxnTransactionDetails", "CollectionAttribute": true, "UsedAsCyclic": false, "ReturnAttribute": false, "IsValueGroupHierarchy": false, "IsEnrichmentLinkedAttribute": false, "IsEnrichmentAttribute": false, "Status": "A"
}

con:assertion.name: Smart Assertion - Valid HTTP status code

con:restRequest.name: UpdateEventAttributeByEventNameBonusIssued
con:restRequest.con:request:
{ "EventAttributeId": "${eventAttributeIdBonusIssued#result}", "AttributeName": "BonusIssuedCount", "ParentAttributeId": "${ParentAttributeIdBonusIssued#result}", "CyclicIndicator": false, "CapIndicator": true, "IsLineItem": false, "CollectionIndicator": false, "DataTypeDrl": "Double", "DataTypeUi": "Number", "EventType": "PurchaseTxn", "AttributeFqn": "PurchaseTxn.CyclicsAndCaps.Caps.BonusIssuedCount", "DroolsVariableName": "$PurchaseTxnCyclicsAndCaps", "CapType": "OUTCOMEISSUED", "CollectionAttribute": false, "UsedAsCyclic": false, "ReturnAttribute": false, "IsValueGroupHierarchy": false, "IsEnrichmentLinkedAttribute": false, "IsEnrichmentAttribute": false, "Status": "A",
}

con:assertion.name: Smart Assertion - Valid HTTP status code

con:restRequest.name: UpdateEventAttributeByEventNamePointsLifeTime
con:restRequest.con:request:
{ "EventAttributeId": "${eventAttributeIdPointsLifetime#result}", "ParentAttributeId": "${ParentAttributeIdPointsLifeTime#result}", "AttributeName": "PointsLifetime", "ValueGroup": "AGGREGATE", "LevelNumber": 11, "CyclicIndicator": false, "CapIndicator": true, "IsLineItem": false, "CollectionIndicator": false, "DataTypeDrl": "Double", "DataTypeUi": "Number", "EventType": "PurchaseTxn", "AttributeFqn": "PurchaseTxn.CyclicsAndCaps.Caps.PointsLifetime", "DroolsVariableName": "$PurchaseTxnCyclicsAndCaps", "CapType": "OUTCOMERESULT", "CollectionAttribute": false, "UsedAsCyclic": false, "ReturnAttribute": false, "IsValueGroupHierarchy": false, "IsEnrichmentLinkedAttribute": false, "IsEnrichmentAttribute": false, "Status": "A"
}

con:assertion.name: Smart Assertion - Valid HTTP status code

con:property.con:name: CreateBody
UpdateBody
